gg.al.logic.component

Class CharacterComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.Component
      • com.artemis.PooledComponent
        • gg.al.logic.component.CharacterComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITemplateable

    public class CharacterComponent
extends com.artemis.PooledComponent
implements ITemplateable
    Created by Thomas Neumann on 23.05.2017.
    Component containing data for controlling a Character.
    Also holds a reference to the Character the entity possess.
